thread.title: Frieddillpickle

author: Frieddillpickle
title: Frieddillpickle
text: I wanted to create an address sign for our lamp post. I realized hand painting, stenciling or applying a letter at a time would take considerable time and skill. By carefully planning the length and height of the letters so they would fit on my varnished wood sign, I was able to easily affix our name, street number and street name to the sign. The lettering was as promised and it went on easily following the directions. It looks great.
